text:
I filed on April 1st and never received a number to call, claim is still pending even though I claimed the $0 benefits for the first week. Am I supposed to call a number? Everybody is talking about not being able to get through on the line but I’ve never even had a number to call so I’m just a tad confused by all of this. I know the American system isn’t exactly as streamlined as possible but I’m really left in the dark here wondering what to do. 

Any help is greatly appreciated! Thanks in advance
title: New American citizen trying to understand UI. Not going through for anybody else?
